td.content: s:pt describes recurrent severe strange behavior over the past month. The patient reports severe sudden drinking of large quantities of alcohol and gambling savings away while playing poker with friends, was formerly reserved, quiet. pt is a 31 YO F. she admits to smoking one pack/day for the last 4 years denies any alcohol use o:Height 166 cm, Weight 62.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Bipolar p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.
